text: Mushrik logon ney kaha kay agar Allah Taalaa chahata to hum aur humaray baap daday uss kay siwa kissi aur ki ibadat hi na kertay na uss kay farman kay baghair kissi cheez ko haram kertay. Yehi fail inn say pehlay kay logon ka raha. To rasoolon per to sirf khullam khulla paygham phoncha dena hai
